alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central White Pine and south central Elko Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 453 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southwest of Currie, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central White Pine and south central Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for northeastern Nevada.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; White Pine County
